[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 0%|rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/security-header-bg.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 42%;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Notre gardien

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/raymond-james-logo-white.jpg” title_text=”raymond-james-logo-white” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”300px” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||30px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée a choisi Raymond James Ltée comme dépositaire privilégié pour assurer la protection des actifs, de l’accès en ligne et des relevés de compte pour notre base de clients.

Qu’est-ce que cela signifie pour vous en tant que client ? Vous bénéficiez de services de gestion d’investissement et de gestion familiale de qualité, combinés à la sécurité de l’une des institutions financières les plus solides d’Amérique du Nord. En tant que société de garde qui s’adresse directement à vous, Raymond James Ltée est indépendante de la société qui gère votre portefeuille.

Raymond James Ltée est l’un des principaux courtiers en valeurs mobilières indépendants d’Amérique du Nord, avec une présence étendue au Canada et aux États-Unis. La relation de Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée avec Raymond James Ltée signifie que nos clients peuvent avoir l’esprit tranquille en sachant que Les Services de correspondants Raymond James nous fournit des solutions complètes pour tous nos besoins en matière de garde et de compensation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in ” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”36px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
Our CustodianRosen Group Private Wealth Management has chosen Raymond James Ltd as our preferred custodian to provide safekeeping of assets, online access, and account statements to our client base. What does this mean for you as a client? You receive boutique investment management and family office services combined with the security of one of North America’s most sound financial institutions. As the custodial firm reporting directly to you, Raymond James Ltd is independent of the firm managing your portfolio. Raymond James Ltd is one of North America’s leading independent full-service investment dealers with an extensive presence across Canada and the United States. Rosen Group Private Wealth Management’s relationship with Raymond James Ltd means that our clients have the peace of mind knowing that Raymond James Correspondent Services provides us with end-to-end solutions for all of our custodial and clearing needs.

Investir dans yourself. your future.
